settings.editor: Platinum Desert Safari Dubai is the most luxurious desert safari one can ever imagine. It’s an exclusive experience curated with meticulous care. Careful attention is given to every minute detail making sure that it leaves discerning guests on a quest for the best thoroughly content. So, book the platinum desert safari tour and experience the grandeur of Arabian traditions. Connect with desertdaytravels Tourism to book your platinum tours Dubai adventure.

What To Expect At Platinum Desert Safari Tour

Firstly, we take you exploring the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve accompanied by a professional conservation guide in a superb luxurious Range Rover. Secondly, take in the beauty of the flora and fauna here spotting Arabian Oryx and Gazelles. Thirdly, we take you on a leisurely tour of the reserve in the comfort of a plush leather seat inside an air-conditioned Range Rover. Next, we make a stop at a Ghaf tree forest for you to take photographs you’ll remember the trip by. We also visit a remote lake in the desert visited by migratory birds which is truly a sight to behold.

From the comfort of a luxurious lounge in the desert, you get to witness an amazing falconry demonstration. Enjoy the mesmerizing sight of the sun going down on the horizon as sip fresh juice with strawberries and canapés bracing yourself for a six-course culinary journey. As the sunlight fades, we take you to a royal retreat in the desert by a tranquil oasis riding on a camel to spend the rest of an unforgettable evening. Ensconced among the sand dunes, you get to relax in a private cabana amid trees that have been softly lit up as you watch the gentle ripples in the oasis.

Enjoy watching our professional chefs prepare a lavish dinner in an open kitchen which includes canapés, soups, salads, entrees, mains, and desserts. You’ll have lots of choices at the dinner as you’ll find delectable roast duck, salmon, prawn, and Australian Angus steak laid out for you. There are vegetarian options available as well. Puff on a shisha as a magnificent acrobat and a fire dancer leave you mesmerized with their magical performance. Thus, the Dubai Platinum Desert Safari is all you need for a fun day out in Dubai.

Tour Itinerary

  • Get picked up in a Range Rover between 02:00 PM and 04:30 PM, depending on the season. We will inform you of the exact pick-up time around noon on the day of your desert safari.
  • Arrive at the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve and receive your Headscarf and a Stainless Steel Water Bottle. These are included in each booking and are a gift for our guests to take home.
  • Take unique pictures with a fleet of museum-quality vintage Land Rovers.
  • Embark on a 60-minute Range Rover nature safari through Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve.
  • Visit a beautiful remote lake, which is also a bird sanctuary.
  • Watch a spectacular falconry performance at an exclusive venue reserved only for Platinum Desert Safari guests.
  • Sunset canapés with sparkling juice and strawberries.
  • Enjoy a camel ride into the sunset, arriving at a serene desert oasis and exclusive cabana.
  • Indulge in a six-course fine-dining dinner.
  • Marvel at captivating entertainment consisting of an acrobatic and fire performance.
  • Return to the city between 09:30 PM and 11:30 PM, depending on the season. Your total experience will last approximately seven hours.

Tour Highlights

  • 60 min. Nature safari in Desert Conservation Centre
  • Falconry
  • Private cabana
  • 6 course meal

Some information you should know

  • We pick you up from your hotel in the Dubai urban area in a shared air-conditioned vehicle. So, you can take transportation services accordingly.
  • The season or the time of sunset decides the pick-up time which is usually between 2:30 PM and 4:30 PM. So, you’ll be notified about it on the day of the tour around noon. You return to the hotel between 9:30 PM and 11:30 PM.
  • We give every guest a Sheila/Ghutra headscarf which they can wear and take home with them in all platinum Tours Dubai.
  • Dubai being warm, we suggest that you come in comfortable and cool clothes. Additionally, wear a hat, sunscreen, and sunglasses.
  • During the winters, you would do wise to bring along some warm clothes as it gets quite chilly after sundown.
  • Vegetarian, vegan, kosher, and gluten-free meals are available for dinner. Also, you only need to inform us about your preference during booking.
  • Bathroom facilities are available in the desert as well as in the camp.
  • The desert safari is conducted by a trained and professional Conservation Guide. Also, the guide has a thorough knowledge of ecotourism and Dubai’s natural environment, cultural heritage, and history.
  • A portion of the Desert Safari booking fee is for a contribution towards Dubai’s local conservation.
  • We also advise that those suffering from backache or any recent injury avoid the camel ride.
  • It is indeed important to suggest that pregnant women who have crossed the third month of pregnancy avoid the wildlife drive.
  • The Platinum Desert Safari is a benchmark in luxury where you pamper yourself with life’s finer things.

Safety Instructions

  • For thе safety and comfort of еxpеctant mothеrs and infants, wе rеcommеnd staying in our air-conditionеd waiting area. Especially during other family members enjoy the camel ride activity.
  • Our priority is to еnsurе a safе and еnjoyablе еxpеriеncе for all guеsts.

So, don't wait any further, contact desertdaytravels for all platinum tours in Dubai. Moreover, try many Desert Safari tours like Morning Desert Safari and Evening Desert Safari too! Finally, it's time to book Platinum Desert Safari Dubai.

FAQs

Q. What is the difference between Desert Safari and Premium Desert Safari?

A more extensive and more individualised desert experience is offered by premium desert safaris, which also feature additional activities and better-quality cars, guides, and food. Smaller tour groups and exclusive access to desert conservation areas are features of premium safaris. Whereas, you get a basic experience when you opt for a normal Desert Safari.

Q. How much does Platinum Tours Dubai cost?

The standard price starts from 1950 AED for all individuals. It is surely a great VIP experience for everyone.

Q. Is Platinum Safari Dubai worth it?

Yes certainly! It is a must-have experience when you plan your Dubai city tour itinerary.

Q. Is there a washroom in Platinum Desert Safari Dubai?

Yes, you get all the facilities and top-notch amenities when you book this tour with us.

Q. What is the best safari in Dubai?

There are various kinds of Desert Safaris available for you in Dubai and Abu Dhabi. You can check them out on our Desert Safari page.

Q. How many hours is a Platinum Desert Safari Dubai?

Usually, platinum desert safari can last up to 6 to 7 hours. Also, it is an great experience for someone who wants to have an all Arabic visit to Dubai.
